success.q: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

focus.q: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

growth.q: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.

learning.q: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

motivation.q: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
